name: Into the Night (Vector Game Studios)
description:
INTO THE NIGHT

🎃 Halloween 2020 Game Dev Week!

This is Into the Night a Halloween Prototype Game made during the last week of October 2020!

In this short platform halloween-themed gameyou will play as a Pumpkin that has received life on the night of Halloween!

As Always any feedback is greatly appreciated!

Game Controls:

A&D - Movement

SPACE BAR - Jump

E - Interact

---------------------

Thanks,

Vector Game Dev
